Class AntLogger

java.lang.Object
org.codehaus.mojo.animal_sniffer.ant.AntLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
Logger
public final class AntLogger extends Object implements Logger
An animal sniffer logger that delegates to a maven log.
Since:
1.3
Author:
connollys
